pr_title: 6634 add chromium based browsers to chrome module

timeline.message:
Initial commit

Initial commit of Chrome based browsers

Update Chrome.java

Add bookmarks and history files to ignore.

timeline.bodyText: Should the module named be changed from Chrome to Chromium?
timeline.author: dannysmyda

timeline.bodyText: If these browser names are going to be displayed to the user, I think they should be put into a Bundle so they can be translated.
timeline.author: dannysmyda

timeline.message:
Add Browser Names to Bundle

Add Browser Names to Bundle so that they can be translated if need be

Update class from chrome to chromium

Update class from chrome to chromium.
